text: Whatever makes men good Christians, makes them good citizens.
author: Daniel Webster

text: Men should strive to think much and know little.
author: Democritus

text: Nothing great will ever be achieved without great men, and men are great only if they are determined to be so.
author: Charles de Gaulle

text: Men tire themselves in pursuit of rest.
author: Laurence Sterne

text: Men often act knowingly against their interest.
author: David Hume
